Html: How do i decrease the scale of it? I need to see nanoseconds, but it is only available to see miliseconds.
I think it has to do with the fact that DateTime only counts miliseconds and not nanoseconds, if you want nano you'll need to define your own DateTime and then create an Axis for it.
